title: The Branching Path
subtitle: Deep Dive into Conditionals
description:
# Deep Dive: If/Else Branching

Let's master conditional logic with more complex scenarios!

## Nested If Statements

You can put if statements inside other if statements:

```gdscript
var has_key = true
var door_locked = true

if door_locked:
    if has_key:
        print("Unlocking door...")
    else:
        print("Need a key!")
else:
    print("Door already open")
```

## Multiple Conditions

Check several things:

```gdscript
var health = 75

if health > 80:
    print("Healthy!")
elif health > 50:
    print("Injured")
elif health > 20:
    print("Critical!")
else:
    print("Near death!")
```

## Your Quest

Create a combat system with branching logic:

1. Check player health level
2. Check if player has healing potion
3. Make decisions based on both conditions
4. Print appropriate messages
